audit.summary: EtherFi has been audited by Quantstamp and Trail of Bits with no critical issues found.

dependency.summary: EtherFi currently integrates with 8 Actively Validated Services (EigenDA, AltLayer, etc.), introducing moderate dependency risk.

compensation.summary: EtherFi Terms of Use indicate user-assumed risk and no explicit insurance or compensation fund.

insightPanel.summary: Validator performance has remained consistent with 3â€“5% APY over recent periods.

learningCorner.avs: An Actively Validated Service (AVS) is a network module that leverages staked ETH to perform secure tasks.
learningCorner.restaking: Liquid restaking lets you reuse your staked ETH to earn extra rewards while maintaining liquidity.
